column4: i'd like to ask a few questions.      1.  is this channel always like this ?     2.  would someone help me get X up and running     3.   is there a users guide to this os, or is it just the general linux howto's ?     4.  any chance of getting an answer to all of the privious questions ?   :)
yes, yes, yes, yes
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UserDocumentation is a good place for getting started
were you violenteering to help ?
indeedy
okay, do you have all the packages installed that you need?
i think everything needed is installed.
i configured X  but now how do i start it ?
two ways...one with 'startx', the other by installing gdm (sudo apt-get install gdm)
do you want a graphical login screen for X?
no
okay...you have your window manager installed?
i have very little space left
like xfce ?
yep, that'll work...try startxfce4
apt-cache search xfce comes up empty ?   i'm new to apt,  that is the correct command isn't it ?
it's in Universe, do you ahve the repository enabled?
okay, you need to enable universe in /etc/apt/sources.list
yes ....but not src part of it ?
should jsut require deleting two #'s from the lines with universe in them
that's optional
sudo apt-get update
